name: Hamster Game Free
description:
This is the best hamster app.
- You can grow a hamster.
- You can know growth of hamster in real time.
- Operation is very easy!

Care is very easy. You should feed hamster once every four days, and clean up only once a week.
Hamster is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of hamster in your daily life!
